title: Athletism — Tennis (Elite) — Phase 2: Work Capacity & Chassis Endurance
equipment: Gym: rack, barbells, dumbbells, cables, landmine
goal: Increase repeatability of points/changes; trunk endurance and shoulder capacity.

warmup: Mobility 8–10' (ankle DF, hips, T‑spine, shoulder IR/ER)
Activation 6–8' (glute med, deep core, scapular control)
Footwork prep: pogos, carioca, lateral skips, crossover steps
main: EMOM 20–24': sled push 20m / box step‑downs 8/leg / bear crawl 15m

notes: Week 1: EMOM 20' circuits. Week 2: EMOM 24' + COD low impact.
